extendedInfo.description: "Growth Chart Lite" helps you to keep track of your childrenâs growth from birth to 20 years old.  It accurately calculates the growth percentile of the weight, height and head circumference based on age and gender, using the most recent US CDC and WHO data, the same data that are used by your pediatrician. You can add multiple children (Pro version only) and save all your data to the database for future review. The saved data can be viewed as tables, or as graphs (measured values vs. ages, or percentiles vs. ages). It provides you with the median value of weight/height/head CC at your childrenâs age, and you can get the values at any percentile by easily sliding the percentage bar. So you can compare your childrenâs growth with that of others, and log your childrenâs growth history and learn the trend. Key features include:-Keep track growth of multiple children (Lite supports only one child);-Save data to SD card (Pro and Lite) or restore the saved data from SD (Pro only); -Provide growth data for infant, toddler, teenager and youth below 20 years old;-Support multiple units for measures, including lb/oz/ft/in and cm/kg;-Log and view the growth history;-Analyze data using tales or graph.The Lite version of the program has limited functionality. If you want to get a fully functional version (also without AD), please upgrade to the "Growth Chart Pro" (http://market.android.com/details?id=com.cooloy.GrowthChartPro). The application is developed by cooloy.com. Thanks for your support!Keywords: baby growth chart, tracker, plot, graphical, weight, height, head CC, boy, girls, percent, pound, ounce, feet, inch, centime, kilogram, regular checkup, pediatric, development, developmental, doctor, center for disease control, world health organization

reviews.title: Totally inaccurate percentiles
reviews.comment: Okay for recording weights. But the percentiles will make you crazy. Percentiles are based on a monthly average, not weekly or daily so if you measure more often than once a month the percentile will increase and then plummet at the start of the next month making you think your baby has swings in weight.
reviews.author: SummerRay Morrow

reviews.comment: Fantastic app!! The update rocks. Now you can backup/ transfer data to sd.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inaccurate?
reviews.comment: Like others it doesn\'t match my records. is there a way to switch between the CDC & WHO charts? They are different charts and apply to breastfed and formula babies differently.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inaccurate?
reviews.comment: Gives wrong charts for Indian children. Given chart suitable only for specific ethnic group. No provision for changing US CDC charts for other ethnic  groups.
reviews.author: Nitin Rivankar

reviews.title: Great app !
reviews.comment: Love that it uses lbs and inches :) great for a busy mom that just needs the basics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my droid x and the percentages were exactly what my son\'s pediatrician said they were (he\'s 3)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy to use, and the chart is very accurate, best growth app I\'ve found yet :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Percentiles don\'t match my doctor\'s charts. Differences are sometimes 10% or more. Otherwise its a nice app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unsatisfactory!
reviews.comment: To add more than one child, need to upgrade to the paid version...really?! I\'m deleting the game not worth it.
reviews.author: Leticia Womack

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Very accurate and usefully to track weight height head CC. Graph is nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Do this app have any African American Babies ??? : (
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The percentiles are incorrect. If you merely want to keep track of measurements, it\'s OK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good program but it CONSTANTLY asks you to upgrade via a pop up window every 2 minutes. Highly annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Measurements
reviews.comment: Would like to use kgs not pounds
reviews.author: A Google User
